_label: Hulagu Khan giving a feast and dispensing favor upon the amirs and princes, from a Chingiz-nama (Book of Chingiz Khan) of the Jami al-tavarikh (Compendium of Chronicles)

identified_by.content: Hulagu Khan giving a feast and dispensing favor upon the amirs and princes, from a Chingiz-nama (Book of Chingiz Khan) of the Jami al-tavarikh (Compendium of Chronicles)

referred_to_by.content: Lal (Indian, active c. 1555–1600), artist; Dharam Das (Indian, active c. 1580–1605), artist; Padarath (Indian, active late 1500s), artist

Georges Demotte [1877-1923], Paris and New York, NY (before 1923); Heeramaneck Collection, New York, NY, to George Bickford (c. 1930-1940); George Bickford [1901-1991], Cleveland, OH, to Ralph Benkaim and Catherine Glynn Benkaim (1950-May 1981); Ralph Benkaim [1914-2001] and Catherine Glynn Benkaim [b. 1946], Beverly Hills, CA (May 1981-2001); (Catherine Glynn Benkaim [b. 1946] and Barbara Timmer, Beverly Hills, CA, sold to the Cleveland Museum of Art) (2001-2013); The Cleveland Museum of Art, Cleveland, OH, 2013-present (2013-)
